message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90? That's a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to pay $82 for the product. That's the lowest I can go.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price, but $82 is just too low for me. I'm confident this product is worth every bit of $90. If you're unable to meet that, I understand, but it's a firm offer.
I understand you're confident in the product's value, but I'm still not comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $82, so I'll offer $86. That's the best I can do.
